sourcing.instructions:

 Lithium Oxide is available from specialized chemical suppliers. 
 Lead Oxide can be found at industrial chemical suppliers. 
 Terbium Oxide can be sourced from rare earth material suppliers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 20 g of Acetate Lithium using a digital scale. 
 2. Measure 40 g of Lithium Oxide. 
 3. Measure 80 g of Lead Oxide. 
 4. Measure 10 g of Terbium Oxide. 
 5. Combine all materials in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 6. Use a spatula to mix the powders thoroughly until a uniform mixture is achieved.
